http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif AUA-NETWORKS List AUA-NETWORKS List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=AUA-NETWORKS&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=AUA-NETWORKS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-03T11:43:59Z Amy Wright 2015-03-03T11:43:52+00:00 2015-03-03T11:43:52+00:00 Reminder: Annual reports due Friday 6th March https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;b7b98ef1.1503 Dear all,<br><br>This is a reminder that your annual reports to capture activity over the past/future 12 months is due this Friday 6th March. Please ignore this email if you have already submitted- and many thanks.<br><br>For those of you that haven't, it would be much appreciated if you could use the attached template and return to me- please keep to a maximum of 1000 words though you may use bullet points to capture key activity if easier. With regards planned activity, you may also record potential events as well as those that are confirmed. [...] Amy Wright 2015-02-27T11:58:12+00:00 2015-02-27T11:58:12+00:00 Conference Training Session https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;91697f00.1502 Hi all,<br><br>With the annual conference approaching, we've begun planning what the training session will cover to assist Coordinators and Advocates with AUA activities. The session will be delivered by Matthew Andrews (details below) from the Board of Trustees and myself.<br><br>As part of our preparation, we welcome your input to ensure that the session covers your needs as far as possible and would like you to forward any suggestions you may have by Friday 6th March. Please include any areas that you feel would be useful to strengthen or discuss during the session. [...] Amy Wright 2015-02-25T09:06:02+00:00 2015-02-25T09:06:02+00:00 New Project Officer: Membership and Networks https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;6f27c8e9.1502 Dear all,<br><br>I have recently joined the AUA National Office and would like to take this opportunity to introduce myself as the new Project Officer for Membership and Networks. I have eight years' HEI experience across various departments having worked on array of projects; the subjects of which have included crime reduction and prevention, online learning, physical regeneration and most recently, an IT project to implement a CRM and other paperless systems to support the activities of the Recruitment and Admission department of Manchester Metropolitan University. I look forward to working with you all and meeting you at the conference [...] Amy Wright 2015-02-25T09:10:35+00:00 2015-02-25T09:10:35+00:00 New Project Officer: Membership and Networks https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;8a397ed2.1502 Dear all,<br><br>I have recently joined the AUA National Office and would like to take this opportunity to introduce myself as the new Project Officer for Membership and Networks. I have eight years' HEI experience across various departments having worked on array of projects; the subjects of which have included crime reduction and prevention, online learning, physical regeneration and most recently, an IT project to implement a CRM and other paperless systems to support the activities of the Recruitment and Admission department of Manchester Metropolitan University. I look forward to working with you all and meeting you at the conference [...] AUA Network Support 2015-02-17T10:17:28+00:00 2015-02-17T10:17:28+00:00 AUA Update https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;4fd93427.1502 Dear Network Coordintors,<br><br>I trust you are all well.<br><br>We are currently collating information to be circulated to the membership in our next AUA Update.<br><br>If you have any information that you feel would be interesting or relevant to our members, please do send this across to auanetworksupport@aua.ac.uk for inclusion by 25 February 2015. [...] Katie Allan 2015-02-09T16:41:02+00:00 2015-02-09T16:41:02+00:00 Introduction/New Departmental Administraros Co-ordinator https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;db59a298.1502 Dear colleagues,<br><br>I would like to take this opportunity to introduce myself to you as the new Network Co-ordinator for the AUA's Departmental Administrators Network. I am delighted to have been appointed as Network Co-ordinator and look forward to meeting you and getting to know you over the coming months.<br><br>I welcome the opportunity to promote professionalism and excellence in departmental administration. I am a passionate advocate for the vital work undertaken by administrative staff in departmental and school contexts and believe that they are often under-valued within their institutions as a whole. I am keen to develop the Network [...] Kimberley Mellor 2015-02-05T12:22:10+00:00 2015-02-05T12:22:10+00:00 Board of Trustees Network Papers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;8b68e1f0.1502 Dear Coordinators,<br><br>Thank you for sending across your Network Reports.<br><br>These have been collated and will be presented to the Board of Trustees at the meeting next week.<br><br>Please find attached the Network Report from the last meeting for your reference.<br><br>Kind regards,<br><br>Kim<br><br>Kimberley Mellor BA (hons)<br>Administration Assistant Association of University Administrators<br><br>www.aua.ac.uk<http://www.aua.ac.uk/?utm_source=signature&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=signature><br>0161 275 2063<br><br>[Conference email template 2]<http://www.aua.ac.uk/event-104-Annual-Conference-and-Exhibition-2015.html> [...] Emma Price 2015-02-05T09:00:23+00:00 2015-02-05T09:00:23+00:00 Re: Events calendar - Submit a proposal for a one day event - DEADLINE EXTENDED https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;fa8b40d1.1502 Dear Kim,<br><br>Apologies if this feel like I am 'shooting the messenger'<br><br>I think the reason you have received so few responses for one day events is that trying to put a proposal together for an event that may happen in the next 18 months is pretty difficult. With a general election looming who knows what higher education is going to look like at the end of this year let alone the end of next year. In my network area I am anticipating major changes as HEFCE reviews arrangements for quality assessment, until these are known though it would be [...] AUA Network Support 2015-02-04T15:09:22+00:00 2015-02-04T15:09:22+00:00 Events calendar - Submit a proposal for a one day event - DEADLINE EXTENDED https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;26ed6c3e.1502 Dear Co-ordinators,<br><br>Thank you to those of you who have submitted a proposal for a one day event in 2015-2016.<br><br>Unfortunately we have received minimal submissions and therefore we have decided to extend the deadline for proposal submissions to midday on 10th February.<br><br>PLEASE NOTE: we have also extended the timeframe for events to include proposals between September 2015 and September 2016. [...] Janet Graham 2015-02-03T11:18:48+00:00 2015-02-03T11:18:48+00:00 Re: Events calendar - Submit a proposal for a one day event - DEADLINE TOMORROW https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;952678a.1502 Hi<br><br>I can't commit to planning anything for 2015 -16 yet, but would like an AUA-SPA Applicant Network meeting event in Birmingham first week in March 2015.<br><br>Do I contact you Kim?<br><br>Thanks<br>Janet<br><br>Janet Graham<br>Director of SPA<br>Supporting Professionalism in Admissions Programme<br><br>Tel: 01242 544919<br>www.spa.ac.uk<http://www.spa.ac.uk><br><br>From: AUA Network Coordinators discussion list [mailto:AUA-NETWORKS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of AUA Network Support<br>Sent: 03 February 2015 11:14<br>To: AUA-NETWORKS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Events calendar - Submit a proposal for a one day event - DEADLINE TOMORROW<br>Importance: High [...] AUA Network Support 2015-02-03T11:14:20+00:00 2015-02-03T11:14:20+00:00 Events calendar - Submit a proposal for a one day event - DEADLINE TOMORROW https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;9bb557.1502 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>The December network bulletin invited co-ordinators to submit proposals for one day events for the next year as the Board will be deciding the calendar of events for 2015-2016 at its next meeting on February 13th.<br><br>The final deadline for submission of proposals has been extended to midday on 4th February. [...] Amanda Shilton Godwin 2015-01-07T10:19:49+00:00 2015-01-07T10:19:49+00:00 AUA Conference - meet the networks https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;67296d01.1501 Dear Colleagues<br><br>In Laura's absence I am picking up the task of meeting the networks at Conference.<br><br>Last year, we ran 'meet the networks' as part of the Conference Fringe for the very first time. For our newest Network Coordinators, we'll explain.<br><br>The meet the networks is part of our 'Conference Fringe' and it gives both members and potential members the opportunity to find out more about AUA and the work we do, and to encourage a greater involvement with each of the networks and their activity. We hope this will provide an informal setting for the delegates to come [...] Tessa Harrison 2014-12-12T11:17:48+00:00 2014-12-12T11:17:48+00:00 Happy Christmas and Thank You https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;4d4ab2cb.1412 Colleagues<br><br>This is just a quick note to wish you a very Happy Christmas and to thank you for all you are doing in your networks to support the AUA and keep us relevant in our professional communities. We could not do all that we do without you and on behalf of the Board of Trustees thank you. [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-12-05T12:26:30+00:00 2014-12-05T12:26:30+00:00 AUA National Office announcements https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;9e64f164.1412 Dear Network Coordinators<br><br>You will shortly be receiving your next email bulletin but there are two important items contained in this that I particularly wanted to draw your attention to.<br><br>Personal Announcement<br>I will be leaving the AUA in January. I will be taking up a post as Teaching and Learning Project Officer for the new engineering campus development at University of Manchester. I've thoroughly enjoyed working at the AUA over the last five years and it's been a pleasure to work with you all. It's been a huge learning opportunity for me and the AUA has put me in [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-08-26T09:21:51+00:00 2014-08-26T09:21:51+00:00 AUA Network Board reports and yearly review https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;e52a802c.1408 Dear all<br><br>The next Board of Trustees meeting will take place on 26 September. If you haven't yet sent me your network report for the next Board of Trustees meeting, please can you send me this by 5 September? Your reports don't need to be long, just a summary of what has happened in your network since the last Board meeting and what you have planned for the upcoming months. Summary bullet points for this report are fine. If you have already sent me your report, then thank you! [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-08-07T15:35:17+00:00 2014-08-07T15:35:17+00:00 Summary Network Reports for AUA Board of Trustees https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;4d47dbc7.1408 Hi all<br><br>The next Board of Trustees meeting will take place on 26 September. Please can you all have your summary network Board reports to me by 5 September? Your reports don't need to be long, just a summary of what has happened in your network since the last Board meeting and what you have planned for the remainder of the 14/15 year. Bullet points for this report are fine. [...] Melissa Bradley 2014-07-01T15:58:16+00:00 2014-07-01T15:58:16+00:00 Re: AUA Network budgets https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;5eb52672.1407 Dear Laura,<br><br>Yes, I can confirm that we would like to have 1 copy of each of the 3 standard roller banners for the use of the Kent network please.<br><br>With many thanks,<br><br>Melissa<br><br>From: AUA Network Coordinators discussion list [mailto:AUA-NETWORKS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Laura Ashcroft<br>Sent: 01 July 2014 16:33<br>To: AUA-NETWORKS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: AUA Network budgets [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-07-01T15:33:22+00:00 2014-07-01T15:33:22+00:00 Re: AUA Network budgets https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;107d1ec5.1407 Hi everyone<br><br>Following on from my email below, several networks have expressed an interest in having our standard roller banners made for use within their own networks.<br><br>We're also planning to have some of these banners made up for the national office, so we'll combine all the orders to reduce costs. The three different designs for the roller banners are attached. The cost for each banner is \ufffd\ufffd102. [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-07-01T10:50:35+00:00 2014-07-01T10:50:35+00:00 AUA Network budgets https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;c1ee7737.1407 Dear Network Coordinators<br><br>I hope you're all enjoying the summer. The rain's been holding off even here in Manchester!<br><br>I just wanted to remind you all about your network budgets. If you haven't yet spent up to your maximum \ufffd\ufffd500 budget then make sure you get in any last minute invoices, events or purchases before the end of July to use it up. Budgets can't be carried over into the next year so you will lose the money if you don't spend it. [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-05-22T12:45:56+00:00 2014-05-22T12:45:56+00:00 Network reports for Board of Trustees https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;83a35e49.1405 Dear Network Coordinators<br><br>The next Board of Trustees meeting is on 20 June 2014, and network reports are due at all Board meetings.<br><br>Please can you send your summary reports through to me by 2 June 2014? Summary reports don't need to be as long as the AGM reports, they can be just a paragraph or bullet points with any recent or upcoming activities. If you have no updates from the reports submitted to AGM please let me know. [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-05-16T10:51:14+00:00 2014-05-16T10:51:14+00:00 FW: One-day Network Conference proposals for 2014/15 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;c8f5f430.1405 Hi all<br><br>This is just a quick reminder that the deadline for submitting a proposal for a one-day Conference for your network for August 2014 through to July 2015 is 5pm on Monday 19 May.<br><br>Unfortunately this is a fixed deadline as the events team will be meeting the following morning to plan a calendar of events to submit to the next Board of Trustees meeting. [...] Laura Ashcroft 2014-05-13T09:36:39+00:00 2014-05-13T09:36:39+00:00 Development Day notes and hand-outs https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;47494758.1405 Hi all<br><br>Just a quick reminder to let you know that if you are having problems downloading the attachments from the recent summary of the Development Session, these are available on the members' website.<br><br>To access these go to http://members.aua.ac.uk/Default.aspx, click the resources tab, then documents. Under 'by category' select 'Network Coordinators' and under 'by network' select 'networking - NC'. The files will show at the end of the list and are entitled 'NC Development Day 2014'. [...] AUA Network Support 2014-05-01T10:47:45+00:00 2014-05-01T10:47:45+00:00 One-day Network Conference proposals for 2014/15 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AUA-NETWORKS;dc68e13d.1405 Dear Network Coordinators<br><br>Each year we have several available spaces for one-day Conferences in the overall AUA events programme.<br><br>We are now collecting proposals for next year - August 2014 through to July 2015. We currently have 4 event spaces available. These are: October 2014; December 2014; February 2015; and May 2015. [...]
